entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 11:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26 except minus 20 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26 except minus 20 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 24 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
